Many people "see" at shopping like an amusement, but I think it's not always a good translation to give it. In my opinion to do shopping is often funny, above all when you can enter without difficulties into a shop. For exemple, if the shop is full of people, is not enjoyable, because they will create too confusion, too noise with the risk of leaving time. Shopping is a funny thing to do, not when you are in a hurry, but when you have free time and when you can relax yourself. Another thing that regardes me, is that I enjoy my self more when I know I have to do shopping for me than when it's for my parents or for somebody else!!!
